Episodes.Title: Glorious Purpose
Episodes.Actors: Tom Hiddleston, Owen Wilson, Gugu Mbatha-Raw
Episodes.Plot: Loki, the God of Mischief, finds himself out of time and in an unusual place and forced - against his godly disposition - to cooperate with others.

Episodes.Title: The Variant
Episodes.Writer: Elissa Karasik, Michael Waldron, Bisha K. Ali
Episodes.Actors: Tom Hiddleston, Sophia Di Martino, Owen Wilson
Episodes.Plot: Mobius puts Loki to work, but not everyone at TVA is thrilled about the God of Mischief's presence.

Episodes.Title: Lamentis
Episodes.Writer: Bisha K. Ali, Michael Waldron, Elissa Karasik
Episodes.Actors: Tom Hiddleston, Sophia Di Martino, Gugu Mbatha-Raw
Episodes.Plot: Loki finds out The Variant's plan, but he has his own that will forever alter both their destinies.

Episodes.Title: The Nexus Event
Episodes.Writer: Eric Martin, Michael Waldron, Jack Kirby
Episodes.Actors: Tom Hiddleston, Sophia Di Martino, Owen Wilson
Episodes.Plot: Frayed nerves and paranoia infiltrate the TVA as Mobius and Hunter B-15 search for Loki and Sylvie.

Episodes.Title: Journey Into Mystery
Episodes.Writer: Tom Kauffman, Michael Waldron, Jack Kirby
Episodes.Actors: Tom Hiddleston, Sophia Di Martino, Owen Wilson
Episodes.Plot: Loki tries to escape The Void, a desolate purgatory where he meets variant versions of himself.

Episodes.Title: Episode #1.6
Episodes.Actors: Tom Hiddleston, Sophia Di Martino, Gugu Mbatha-Raw
Episodes.Plot: Loki and Sylvie venture into the 'void beyond all', and uncover the truth behind the TVA.
